data.title: Publishing and Distribution
data.meta_description: If you’re wondering how to get your comic or book published and distributed, you’re not alone! And we’re here to help. We can help you either through our Mentoring services to offer advice and help you get on your way to finding your own publisher, or in some cases, we can use the resources available to us through our sister company called CEX Publishing. CEX is a full publishing company with exclusive distribution deals with multiple industry distributors and book store distribution as well. CEX’s comics and books can be found in shops the world over.
data.text:
If you’re wondering how to get your comic or book published and distributed, you’re not alone! And we’re here to help. We’d recommend you join the Comics Experience Community as a Pro Member where you’ll get access to all kinds of helpful information, topics, and experienced creators and publishers who have first hand experiences with exactly what you’re going through.

If you’re looking for a more personalized guide through the business and/or craft of making and distributing comics, you may want to get set up with a personal Mentor who can offer advice and help you get on your way to finding your own publisher and bringing your comic or graphic novel to life!
